description:
Momoko and her friends leave on a journey to find the Michimi Peach Fragments.  She visits the country of Satsuma with the Celestial Maiden Squad and runs into a weird girl at the snack shop.  She forgets about the peach fragment and challenges the girl to an eating contest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 合縁鬼縁!? 鬼姫参上!
